summary: A teenage boy discovers the perpetrators of several brutal kidnappings in his home town.
cast: Dana Melanie|J. Michael Trautmann|Clint James|Victoria Spencer Smith|Darren Kennedy|Daniel Fredrick|Shannon Knopke|Chance Nichols|Nick Herra|Caleb Cox|Mallory Malibu Waugh|Debbie Forrester|Nathan L. Henderson|Vincent Michael-Smith|Meghan Socha|Daniel Smith|Elaine Jenkins|Jake Gregory
director: Director: Michael G. Bartlett (as Michael Bartlett)
title: Treehouse
